divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my cell phone about 7:20 pm happened to look up when I seen one orange orb appear then another on the right then another on the left and one on the back right and then on back left all were glowing in a circular pattern then like a light switch they all went off at the same time They were above a housing community sky was dark.lasted about 2 min.
Summary: 5 orange glowing orbs lighting one at a time
trends: There have been no other sightings in Surfside
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
